They had finished the Kyoto arc, they left off on episode 24 and I know...I sent CN a feedback...I've seen the final showdown with Shishio... 

Warg3791@... wrote:In a message dated 4/14/2004 1:17:17 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
mg_batt@... writes:
I don't know how far Cartoon Network got into Kenshin... What episode 
did it stop? Did they even finish the Kyoto arc? Personally, for me 
if it did I'd rather have the anime stop right there as I've always 
felt it went downhill after especially towards the end... If they 
didn't even do the Kyoto arc yet, then yeah, I'd definitely be upset. 
They showed the Kyoto arc...Once. Last summer. That was it. And I missed the 
final showdown with Shishio! That's why I got mad and rounded the entire thing 
up on DVD. They were too slow about showing anything. Now they're not even 
going to show it a second time (at least not yet). EVIL CN.
